# Daesy's Tropical Sno

> Daesy's Tropical Sno is a shaved ice and snow cone shop in Arlington, Texas. We offer 40+ flavors and 55+ signature concoctions with tropical vibes and icy delights. We also cater events and parties.

## Location
3814 Little Rd, Arlington, TX 76016

## Hours
1:00 PM - 8:00 PM, Tuesday through Sunday
Closed Monday

## Contact
- Phone: (817) 401-6310
- Website: https://daesyssno.com
- Instagram: @daesystropicalsno
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/1BpnqGxn1a/

## Services
- Shaved ice / snow cones
- 40+ unique flavors
- 55+ signature concoctions
- Events and party catering
- Private bookings available

## About
Family-owned shaved ice stand bringing tropical vibes to Arlington, TX. Perfect for hot Texas days, birthday parties, corporate events, and community gatherings.
